column6: Input directory containing ExpressionSet object generated by 'scprep' R package
FALSE if no batch correction desired; Select "harmony" or "cca" (original Seurat method) (will be ignored if 'batch_var' is set to FALSE)

FALSE if no batch correction desired; Otherwise, specify ExpressionSet metadata (pData) entry name (likely from scprep_annotation.csv) corresponding to batch variable (will be ignored if 'batch_correction_method' is set to FALSE)
Maximum number of principal components to be used as input for Seurat clustering and dimensionality reduction
Comma separated values for Seurat clustering resolution (low values for less clusters, high values for more clusters)
TRUE to run tSNE using the Seurat "RunTSNE" function; FALSE to ignore
TRUE to run UMAP using the Seurat "RunUMAP" function; FALSE to ignore
Number of tSNE and UMAP iterations to produce for visualization
Maximum adjusted p-value from differential expression analysis considered for cluster-associated gene set assignment
Minimum mean cluster Z-score (SD from the mean) considered for cluster-associated gene set assignment
Type of single-cell data object to create: eset' (ExpressionSet), 'seurat' (Seurat), or 'sce' (SingleCellExperiment)
Type of single-cell data object to create: FALSE to match 'input_type', eset' (ExpressionSet), 'seurat' (Seurat), or 'sce' (SingleCellExperiment)
